title: woman facepalming: light skin tone

To bring one's face down to one's cupped hand or hands.
Bring the palm of the hand to the face.

description: The Woman Facepalming, Type-1-2 emoji is a sequence of the  Face Palm,  Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-1-2, ? Female Sign and ? Variati
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the light skin tone woman facepalming emoji captures a moment of exasperation or disbelief with Apple's characteristic detailed and expressive rendering. Her face, subtly shaded with realistic lighting, shows a clear gesture of covering her eyes, communicating a feeling of 'oh dear' or 'I can't believe this' with a touch of gentle humor. The emoji's soft rounded edges and smooth gradients contribute to its relatable and universally understood message of mild frustration or overwhelming realization in digital communication.
